attributes.action: Give all gcse and a level students minimum pass.
attributes.additional_details: Because this lockdown has affected many people and has ruined many people’s lives from last years results. I personally think this is the best way to do it as last year was rushed and not well thought out.
attributes.background: Give all students a standard pass as they will not have enough work in order to get the mark they would get if they took the exam. Then give the option to retake in order for a higher more personal mark.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for teachers.
